title: Coronavirus Treatments, Trials and the New York Hospital Bed Expansion

content: Today, New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo warned that the coronavirus curve hasnt been flattened, and is actually increasing. He then cautioned that the apex of the virus could be as many as 14 to 21 days away. They now project a need for 140,000 beds at the peak and… [+3425 chars]
